Package com.esprit.controllers.films

Class SeatSelectionController

java.lang.Object
com.esprit.controllers.films.SeatSelectionController
public class SeatSelectionController extends Object
Controller class responsible for seat selection in the cinema booking process.

This controller manages the seat grid interface where users can select their preferred seats for a movie session. It visualizes the seat layout with color coding to indicate available, occupied, and selected seats.

Key features:

  • Interactive seat grid with visual status indicators
  • Multi-seat selection capability
  • Integration with payment processing
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
RAKCHA Team

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize (MovieSession moviesession, Client client)
      Initializes the seat selection controller with movie session and client information.

      This method configures the controller with the provided movie session and client data, then loads the seat layout based on the cinema hall associated with the session.

      Parameters:
      moviesession - the movie session for which seats are being selected
      client - the client who is selecting the seats
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either moviesession or client is null
